game_description: Now with Quest 2 enhancements! Jump into a nitro fuelled world where little cars mean BIG fun! Spanning across reclaimed ruins and scorched outbacks through to rain soaked docks and sun-kissed tropical islands - Mini Motor Racing X will take you on a micro driving journey across the globe like no other. FEATURES: QUEST 2 ENHANCEMENTS: Stunning new water & reflections with higher render resolutions than ever before HUGE CAREERS: Collect dozens of cars and race on over 50 tracks in hundreds of races with vibrant, rich visuals, day and night and in varying weather conditions. PARTY MODES: Play with your friends in a selection of wild party games including Bumper Ball, Drop Zone, Battle Area and more! UPGRADE YOUR RIDES: Pump your hard earned winnings into upgrades to help give you the edge. MULTIPLAYER: Full online multiplayer with up to 4 friends and campaign co-op. MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY: Play from in-car, top-down, track-side or anywhere else that takes your fancy!
Languages: English, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Venezuela)
